Brave Bunnies

Close

Brave Bunnies

Shooting date: 2021

Country: España

Director: Tim Fehrenbach, Olga Cherepanova

Scriptwriter:

Producer: Ánima y Glowberry.

Cast:

Location: Gran Canaria

Brave Bunnies is an animated entertaining and educational 2D series for preschool kids (52 episodes, 7 minutes each). The main idea of the series is to show kids the diversity of the world around them, teach them to accept various traits of others and successfully communicate even with those who are completely different. Using the example of Brave Bunnies and their friends, parents can explain how to interact with other kids in the kindergarten or at the playground. In each episode, Brave Bunnies meet friends and come up with a fun game to play together.

Vampus Horror Tales

Close

Vampus Horror Tales

Shooting date: 2020

Country: Spain

Director: Víctor Matellano, Isaac Berrocal, Manuel Martínez Velasco, Erika Elizalde, Piter Moreira

Scriptwriter: Víctor Matellano, Yolanda García Serrano, Victoria Vázquez, Ignacio López-Vacas, Isaac Berrocal, Piter Moreira, Diego Arjona (Idea: Víctor Matellano)

Producer: Argot Films con la colaboración de Wild Duck Productions, ViMa pc, Raccord Films, Inflilmity y RedRum

Cast: Saturnino García, Nacho Guerreros, Félix Gómez, Montse Pla, Elena Furiase, Diego Arjona, Erika Sanz, Dunia Rodríguez, Luis Hacha, Daniela Dardanelli, Almudena León, Rafa Rodrigo, David M. Santana, Marian Clar, Gus Cantolla, Alberto Rivas, Marina Romero, Sergio Morcillo, Jose Lifante, África Gozalbes, Micky Molina, Carlos Iglesias

Location: Gran Canaria, Madrid

An anthology of horror stories, introduced by a sinister undertaker as host. This is how Vampus Horror Tales is presented, a film that has Saturnino García as the presenter of each of the fragments that make it up.

Vampus Horror Tales, is filmed in black and white and scope format in the image of the popular classics of the fantasy genre that it honors.

In addition, in the scene that they have filmed on the Island they have counted with the Canarian actor David M. Santana and a local team with Angel Hernández Suárez and Manuel Peña Ramos.

Canary Islands. The daughters of fire

Close

Canary Islands. The daughters of fire

Shooting date: 2020

Country: España

Director: Juan Antonio Rodríguez Llano

Scriptwriter:

Producer: Terra Incógnita

Cast:

Location: Gran Canaria, Islas Canarias

When rocks engulfed by flames emerge from the middle of the ocean, new opportunities arise for the species that manage to reach them… This is the case of the Canary Islands, eight islands born from fire, very different from each other, that form an archipelago full of life. The castaways that reached their coasts millions of years ago have evolved due to their geographic isolation, becoming endemic species and creating astonishing ecosystems, unique in the world.

The Canary Islands will show the world the richness and diversity of Canarian nature in its purest form, through the documentary 'Islas Canarias, las Hijas del Volcán, shot by the producer Terra Incógnita during the period of confinement, with the collaboration of Promotur Turismo of the Canary Islands.

Pico & Pinza

Close

Pico & Pinza

Shooting date: 2020

Country: Spain

Director: Enrique Diego, Jose Díaz y Dani Hernández.

Scriptwriter:

Producer: Perruncho Studio

Cast: Pico & Pinza

Location: Gran Canaria

Pico, a wild seagull, and Pinza, a grumpy crab, are best friends. They both live on a paradisiacal beach where garbage remains every day. Playing with them, Pico often annoys Pinza and they fight. Later they both manage in an imaginative and fun way to, from the remains, create a recycled and useful object. From a carafe they create a lamp, from old socks puppets, from glasses of yogurt a palm tree ... Series for children from 4 to 6 years old made in stop motion with papier-mâché characters and real objects.

Shark Academy

Close

Shark Academy

Shooting date: 2020

Country: España

Director: Ruben Zarauza, Elena Catalán

Scriptwriter:

Producer: Birdland

Cast: White, Pingu, Hammer, Saw, Tigress, Whale-T

Location: Gran Canaria

Welcome to Shark Academy - Children's Songs! In their early years, each Baby Shark must learn the ways of their species: the habits and quirks of sharks ... something that will ensure their survival and development in today's world! And there is no better place for it than SHARK ACADEMY, where our sharks will discover their surrounding world and all it has to offer for the first time. Our little sharks will carry out different activities during the day; singing and dancing, having fun in the backyard, playing pirates on the boat, dressing up, unleashing your imagination, playing games and learning new shapes and colors ... Follow White, Pingu, Hammer, Saw, Tigress, Whale-T on their adventures , helping children explore, play and interact along the way ... in short, IMAGINE. If you like shark songs, then you will love SHARK ACADEMY!

The Swedish drama series revolves around the lives of a family in Stockholm, including father Sten (Johan Ulveson, Bonus Family) and his daughter Clara (Josephine Bornebusch, Welcome to Sweden) and son Aron (Gustav Lindh, Beartown).Sten is bereft. He also can’t get a refund on the 40,000 kroner trip, so he decides to go solo on the two-week Senior Love Romantica package on Spain’s Gran Canaria — and meets Anita (Görel Crona, Spring Tide).The series won the Kristallen Award in the category "TV-drama series of the Year 2020".

El final de la verdad

Close

Shooting date: 2019

Country: Alemania

Producer: Seven Islands Film, ARTE, ZDF, Das kleine Fernsehspiel See, Walker Worm Film

Cast: Ronald Zehrfeld, Alexander Fehling, Claudia Michelsen, Axel Prahl

Location: Gran Canaria

Martin Behrens (Zehrfeld) is a Middle East expert for the German intelligence agency BND for whom he obtains information that leads to a U.S. drone strike on a wanted terrorist in Zahiristan. A few days later, a terrorist attack presumed to be a payback for the drone strike hits all too close to home for Martin. Shaken to his core, he starts to investigate the linked attacks on his own. What he uncovers will bring him to the realisation that the line between good and evil is far more narrow that he could have ever imagined.

The film tells the story of Carlos, a senior executive who is called upon to intercede in the kidnapping of an American engineer who works for an oil company. This assignment will mean the return of this negotiator to the African continent, where he was already in the past as a cooperator for the United Nations after completing his academic training stage.

Pocoyó

Close

Pocoyó

Shooting date: 2019

Country: Spain

Director: David Cantolla, Alfonso Rodríguez, Guillermo García Carsí

Scriptwriter: Guillermo García Carsí, Andy, Yerken, Khaki Jones

Producer: Koyi (Zinkia)

Cast: Pocoyó, Pato, Elly, Loula, Pajaroto, Nina

Location: Gran Canaria

Pocoyo is a Spanish series created by David Cantolla, Colman López, Luis Gallego and Guillermo García Carsi. It is produced by Zinkia Entertainment, being distributed by ITV Global. It consists of 5 seasons of 52 episodes, each about seven minutes long, a short for film and television, two video games for DS and Wii, and a website called mundopocoyo.com.

It tells the adventures of a preschooler named Pocoyo, who is discovering the world and interacting with it. He is accompanied by his friends, Pato, Elly, Pajaroto (in the Latin American version he is sometimes called Sleepy Bird) and his pet Loula. Each chapter is introduced and led by a voice over. In the Spanish version, José María del Río puts his voice and in the version for Latin America, Orlando Arenas and Adal Ramones. In the English version, the person in charge of introducing and interacting with the characters is the British actor Stephen Fry. Pocoyo's world is a 3D scene, with a white plane and no colored backgro

Molang is a humorous series that is based on the relationship of an eccentric, happy and enthusiastic rabbit and a shy, discreet and emotional chick. Despite their differences, the two will live a unique friendship.

We will discover the day to day of the two characters with humor. Whether you are considering a trip to the moon or watering your garden, the situations that Molang and Piu Piu will experience will be unpredictable.

But precisely because they are sensitive, empathetic and creative, whatever happens to them will be an opportunity to discover new ways to be happy and have fun.

Los últimos de Filipinas

Close

Los últimos de Filipinas

Shooting date: 2016

Country: España

Director: Salvador Calvo

Scriptwriter: Alejandro Hernández

Producer: CIPI producciones

Cast: Luis Tosar, Emilio Palacios, Álvaro Cervantes, Javier Gutiérrez, Karra Elejalde, Carlos Hipólito, Eduard Fernández, Ciro Miró, Patrick Criado, Miguel Herrán, Ricardo Gómez, Alexandra Masangkay, Maykol Hernandez

Location: Santa Lucía de Tirajana

The Siege of Baler (July 1, 1898 – June 2, 1899) was a battle of the Philippine Revolution and concurrently the Spanish–American War and the Philippine–American War. Filipino revolutionaries laid siege to a fortified church manned by colonial Spanish troops in the town of Baler, Philippines for 11 months, or 337 days. The battle is considered part of the Spanish–American War since the Filipinos were allied with the United States at the outset. That war ended in December 1898 with Spain's surrender and annexation of the Philippines to the United States. However, cut off from communications with their own government and military, the Spanish forces continued their defense against the Filipino forces until 1899.

Carlos is a man who works in Oviedo (capital of Principality of Asturias, north to Spain) in a local TV as Kar-El, a fortune-teller who predicts the future of the people using digital tarot cards. In his daily life out of the work, Carlos is a lonely man living in his own world, stuck in the past unable to handle his own life and frustrated by his unsuccessful wishes to be an actor following the steps of his mother, Carmen, considered the most important Spanish actress of all times. But when a national TV channel offers Carlos the chance to appear in a famous TV show, it will force Carlos to face his actual situation about him and his family, making some discoveries: that his rebel and more experimented daughter Melina doesn't want to be heavy metal's singer but goalkeeper, that his shy son Jon is gay and that he doesn't want lawyer but ballet dancer, and that Carmen is diagnosed with a terminal cancer…

A group of thieves led by a man called El Uruguayo stalk a bank in Valencia to steal as many safety boxes as possible and later flee through a dug tunnel that communicates the building with an abandoned subway station. However, the press officer of the Prime Minister discovers what the thieves are actually after: they want to get their hands on box 314, property of Gonzalo Soriano, a former member of the government who slipped into a coma after a severe accident, left documents with compromising information. The gang's plans start to go awry when the tunnel is flooded by heavy rain, leaving them with no escape, plus to discover that the box really doesn't contains documents, but an external hard drive full of data about important names in all levels of the Spanish politic. At the same time, a fixer of the government receives the mission to assume the control of the negotiations, looking for recover at any cost the box 314 and the information before the robbers flee with it.

The only problem is that with their low salaries, the most they have achieved so far is living in a shared apartment, fellow jobs, boys allergic to compromise, and to be able to buy only clothes on sales... But Nora and her friends don’t give up to the harsh reality of living, because they invent their reality. Set on a fictional Spanish island, Woody follows the fortunes of one of the UK's best undercover reporters. Woody (Novak) is forced to go on the run from the British authorities after being set up by his corrupt newspaper editor. Woody escapes to find the one man he can trust, his former mentor at the newspaper, Brutus (Walsh). Now an expatriate living a quiet life running a bar on a Spanish island, Brutus is initially less than thrilled to see Woody. However, he soon realises that he can profit by putting his trouble-making protege to work. Woody takes on a series of investigations on the island, running rings around the locals by using his astonishing ability to adopt a variety of guises at a moment's notice.

Location: Finca de Osorio

Killian is a young man who has never left the remote mountains of Huesca (Spain) which saw him grow up. In 1953, he travels back to the exotic Equatorial African island of Fernando Poo, in Spanish Guinee, where he was born, to work in a cacao plantation alongside his father and his brother. During 20 years in this island, until the troubled days of independence, he will undertake a journey towards maturity and knowledge, but will also have to deal with pain and loss. After the death of her Father, a young Spanish woman discovers a partial letter that leaves her with many unanswered questions. As she searches for the answers, she embarks on a journey that takes her back to the African Island in Spanish Guinee, Fernando Poo. There, she unfolds the secrets of her family.

Moments before his comeback performance, a concert pianist who suffers from stage fright discovers a note written on his music sheet. Tom Selznick (Elijah Wood) is the most talented pianist of his generation, but has stopped performing in public because of his stage fright. Years after a catastrophic performance, he reappears in public for a long awaited concert in Chicago. In a packed theater, in front of an expectant audience, Tom finds a message written on the score: “Play one wrong note and you die.” In the sights of an anonymous sniper (John Cusack), Tom must get through the most difficult performance of his life and look for help without being detected.

Fast & Furious 6

Shooting date: 2013

Country: EEUU

Director: Justin Lin

Scriptwriter: Chris Morgan

Producer: Universal Pictures / Original Film / Etalon film

Cast: Vin Diesel, Paul Walker, Dwayne "The Rock" Johnson, Gina Carano, Michelle Rodriguez, Luke Evans, Jordana Brewster, Elsa Pataky, Sung Kang, Gal Gadot, Ludacris, Tyrese Gibson, Joe Taslim, Rita Ora

Location: Varias localizaciones en Gran Canaria

Since Dom (Vin Diesel) and Brian's (Paul Walker) Rio heist toppled a kingpin's empire and left their crew with $100 million, our heroes have scattered across the globe. But their inability to return home and living forever on the lam have left their lives incomplete. Meanwhile, Hobbs (Dwayne Johnson) has been tracking an organization of lethally skilled mercenary drivers across 12 countries, whose mastermind (Luke Evans) is aided by a ruthless second-in-command revealed to be the love Dom thought was dead, sexy Letty (Michelle Rodriguez). The only way to stop the criminal outfit is to outmatch them at street level, so Hobbs asks Dom to assemble his elite team in London. Payment? Full pardons for all of them so they can return home and make their families whole again.

You Choose (Tú elijes)

You Choose (Tú elijes)

Shooting date: 2009

Country: España

Director: Antonia San Juan

Scriptwriter: Antonia San Juan, Luis Miguel Seguí

Producer: Trece Producciones S.L.

Cast: Antonia San Juan, Luis Miguel Seguí, Neus Asensi, Mala Rodríguez, Chema Rodríguez, Andrés Lima, Helena Castañeda, David de Gea, Félix Navarro, Paula Andrés, Secun de la Rosa

Location: Las Palmas de Gran Canaria

You Choose is a comedy with realistic and current dramatic brushstrokes. Throughout a day cross the lives of several characters from different social classes, from the woman of fifty who still lives in adolescence, the millionaire lady who boredom gives lectures on Feng-Shui, via a star pop or an actor who tries to thrive. The actions of some affect others who do not even know, and in the end, everyone will face their dreams and ambitions with mixed fortunes.

The island inside

A film about three shipwrecked souls. Martín wants to leave his parents’ house and become a writer in Paris. Gracia is particularly keen on separating the facts from the fiction her life has turned into. As for Coral, she just wants to be loved. The forthcoming death of their father forces them to leave the inner island in which they live –isolated from the world around them, from their dreams and indeed from themselves.

Mr. Arturo, an old rich Spanishman who arrives to Havana to marry Yoli, dies suddenly in bed. Yoli's family, afraid of losing all the money, convinces her ex-boyfriend Papito to go to Spain and get the money. Papito will have to be clever enough to deceive everybody and succeed in Spain.

Swindled (Incauto)

Close

Swindled (Incauto)

Shooting date: 2004

Country: España

Director: Miguel Bardem

Scriptwriter: Miguel Bardem y Carlos Martín

Producer: Alquimia Cinema

Cast: Victoria Abril, Ernesto Alterio, Federico Luppi, Manuel Alexandre, Gilbert Melki, Alejandro Casaseca, Luis Castejón, Manuel Morón

Location: Costa Meloneras, Aeropuerto de Gran Canaria.

The swindled is a film about con artists. This story’s only truth is that everything can be a lie. Ernesto has only done one thing in his whole life, to cheat. He knows the tricks of cheating from an old con artist called El Manco (manco is someone who only has one hand). He gets Ernesto in touch with a man he considers to be the best con ever, Federico, an elegant, clever and methodical swindler. Life couldn’t go better until Pilar, Federico’s ex-lover and partner, appears on the scene.
